title: biodosetools 3.5.0.9000
text: Major rewrite plot_estimated_dose_curve() function. Added progress alert notifications UI. Added {markdown} suggested dependency. Added {cli} dependency. Tweaked references section {pkgdown} site include exported functions organised topic/usage. Use consistently genomic conversion factor genome_factor across functions, help dialogues, reports.

title: biodosetools 3.5.0.9000
text: Return conf_int estimate_*() family functions. Parse est_full_doses$type plot_estimated_dose_curve() function unused assessments shown legend. Added match_names() function match est_doses list names calling plot_estimated_dose_curve(). Updated plot_estimated_dose_curve() automatically build est_full_doses object list dose estimation results, added parse_conf_int_text() auxiliary function.

title: biodosetools 3.5.0.9000
text: Correct dispersion index value estimate_whole_body_delta() ’s aberrations. Fixed issue missing count data DOCX fitting report. Removed double calculation cov_est estimate_partial_dolphin(). Wrapped mixed Poisson model dose estimation try() ensure convergence (5 tries).

title: biodosetools 3.5.0.9000
text: Fixed order output case data columns calculate_aberr_table() match final output Shiny. Renamed count-data-IAEA.csv count-data-barquinero-1995.csv Barquinero et al. (1995) https://doi.org/10.1016/0027-5107(94)00150-4. Added count-data-rodriguez-2004.csv total translocations fom Rodriguez et al. (2004) https://doi.org/10.1667/RR3198. Updated translocations fitting unit tests use data Rodriguez et al. (2004) https://doi.org/10.1667/RR3198. Rewrote calculate_aberr_power() remove {purrr} dependency reduce computation time 4. Replaced message() calls appropriate cli::cli_*() calls. Split quasi-Poisson automatic fitting fit_glm_method(), otherwise confusing. Updated \sigma \hat{\sigma} fix_count_data_names() respective tests.

title: biodosetools 3.5.0.9000
text: Added new side-widget-* CSS classes better style file download/format buttons. Added widget_sep_vert() function. Use new sep-widget_* CSS classes fitting UI modules. Updated report help modals text. Using new side-widget-* CSS classes dose estimation UI modules. Added progress notifications calculations via shiny::Progress. Updated _pkgdown.yml simplified extra.css thanks Bootstrap 5 support {pkgdown} 2.0.

title: biodosetools 3.5.0 (2021-05-26)
text: Added unit tests check code coverage validate code performs expected. Major revision fitting dose estimation pipelines, introducing new auxiliary functions reduce duplicated code. Major simplification report rendering process; abandoned HTML output. Added custom {pkgdown} theme consistent branding. Added preliminary citation README. Moved packages required reports Suggests field DESCRIPTION file.

title: biodosetools 3.5.0 (2021-05-26)
text: Added irradiation conditions input dose-effect fitting modules. Reports include conditional formatting u-value formatting refinements. Added biodosetools_version element Shiny App’s exported *-fitting-data-YYY-MM-DD.rds files. fit() function allows optionally select "glm" "maxlik" algorithms. "glm" selected, original tryCatch() routine executed.

title: biodosetools 3.5.0 (2021-05-26)
text: Fixed unexported calculate_aberr_var() function. Stopped using weights fitting algorithms (glm glm.nb). Fixes #20, addresses part #14 well. Fixed aggregated count data column parsing fix_count_data_names() function. Fixed case data parsing issue .csv file perfectly formatted. Fixed issue manual fitting curve input (fixes #23). Fixed bug calculate_yield_infimum() infima calculated yield estimate (fixes #26). Fixed wrong calculation aberrations X Ck k>=10 (fixes #27). Fixed fix_count_data_names() properly correct Ck>=C10 (related issue #27). Added “” global variables (see https://github.com/r-lib/tidyselect/issues/201).

title: biodosetools 3.5.0 (2021-05-26)
text: inner_column(), fix padding boxes inside columns. widget_sep(), insert div(class = "widget-sep", br()) calls. widget_sep_vert() insert div(style = "height: 8px;") calls. names_from_model_formula(), parse rhandsontable() Unicode row column coefficient names. parse_model_formula() get raw TeX formulae model_formula. calculate_trans_rate_sigurdson() calculate_trans_rate_manual() calculate translocation rates. calculate_aberr_table() wrapper, calculate aberration tables count cases data. init_aberr_table(), initialise aberration distribution tables fitting estimation server modules. list_fitting_formulas(), replace global global_fitting_formulas object. generalise_fit_coeffs() generalise_fit_var_cov_mat(), used internally estimation functions instead using general_fit_* parameters.

title: biodosetools 3.5.0 (2021-05-26)
text: Refactored get_decision_threshold() functoin calculate_decision_threshold(), added calculate_decision_threshold_table() wrapper function. Refactored calculate_decision_threshold_*() functions remove input argument. Refactored get_*() translocation functions calculate_*() better consistency. Refactored get_*_dose_curve() functions plot_*_dose_curve() clarity. Refactored get_model_statistics() calculate_model_stats(). Refactored get_fit_*() functions fit() fit_*_method().

title: biodosetools 3.5.0 (2021-05-26)
text: Added Oliveira citation get_fit_maxlik_method() function. Fixed Gaëtan’s name order citation contributors list. Updated README body text. Renamed source R files better naming consistency. Changed structure modules mod_<calc_type>_<aberration>_*(). Generalised get_model_statistics() function local get_model_statistics() definition removed mod_estimate_fit_curve_server() module. Multiple (18 files) <aberration>-<module>-<format>.Rmd report templates merged <module>-<format>.Rmd (4 files). Use correct_negative_vals() ensure correct dose estimation X < Xc translocations asay. Replaced *_at() *_if() occurrences {dplyr} 1.0.0 equivalents.

title: biodosetools 3.5.0 (2021-05-26)
text: Replaced column(width = X) calls col_X() UI modules. Added tabitem-container class tabItem() page containers fixed max-width keeping responsive UI. Added col-inner-textinput-* CSS classes Irradiation conditions textInput() widgets’ containers. Added sep-widget-download sep-widget-format CSS classes unify download format select buttons single widget.

title: biodosetools 3.4.0 (2020-10-11)
text: Removed non-ASCII characters. Major overhaul reports. Added “Report bug” button home screen cleaned dashboard_*() code. Removed dependencies {stringr} package. Initial utils::citation() support via CITATION file. Minimal version R bumped 3.5.0. Minimal version {dplyr} bumped 1.0.0.

title: biodosetools 3.4.0 (2020-10-11)
text: Replaced C, α, β variables (derivatives) coeff_C, coeff_alpha, coeff_beta. Fixed error genome_fraction parsing translocations estimate_partial_dolphin(). Fixed count/case data standard error column names replacements. Fixed minipage issue using 12 columns {knitr} tables column name replacements, using format = "latex", escape = FALSE parameters kable() call. Supress YAML warning using !expr PDF reports. See https://github.com/rstudio/rstudio/issues/7545.

title: biodosetools 3.4.0 (2020-10-11)
text: fix_coeff_names(), fix coefficient names reports. fix_count_data_names(), fix count/case data column names PDF reports. to_title(), replace stringr::str_to_title() using base R.

title: biodosetools 3.4.0 (2020-10-11)
text: New PDF reports, now default output format. Improved HTML reports styling. Added explicit M-FISH usage translocation reports. Added assay name report titles.

title: biodosetools 3.3.1 (2020-10-07)
text: Count case data calculations performed using calculate_aberr_*() functions. Fixes #8. Fixed missing {dplyr} namespace n() function call. Fixed mismatched use awesomeCheckbox() switchInput() confounders input.

title: biodosetools 3.3.1 (2020-10-07)
text: calculate_aberr_power(), supersedes internal aberr_calc() function server modules. calculate_aberr_mean(). calculate_aberr_var(). calculate_aberr_disp_index(). calculate_aberr_u_value().

title: biodosetools 3.3.0 (2020-07-27)
text: Initial migration app {golem} R package. means Biodose Tools also available regular R package case user wants build R scripts. also reduced lots code redundancies, made de code lot robust.

title: biodosetools 3.3.0 (2020-07-27)
text: App now {golem} R package. Migrated UI {shinydashboard} {bs4Dash}. Modals now built {bsplus} instead {shinyBS}. Functions internal data documented using {roxygen2}. Added {pkgdown} support build {biodosetool}’s website automatically. custom theming done SASS CSS instead R code injection.

title: biodosetools 3.3.0 (2020-07-27)
text: New include_help() help dialogues New help_modal_button() function help build modal trigger buttons boxes’ titles. New load_rmd_report() function use server downloadHandler(). Moved get_genome_fraction() exported function.

title: biodosetools 3.3.0 (2020-07-27)
text: Fixed #7. Overestimate error lambda dispersion smaller 1. Fixed missing icon sidebar. Fixes collapse button paddings. Fixed tabBox parameters. Using rlang::.data$ avoid “visible binding global variable” warnings. Fixed bsplus::bs_modal() calls output$estimate_results_ui. Removed input parameter calculation functions. Fixed style help button box/tabBox headers. Updated old “biodosimetry-uab” URLs “biodosetools-team”.

title: biodosetools 3.3.0 (2020-07-27)
text: Stop exporting auxiliary include*() functions used app . Moved widget_label() widgets.R. Refactored inner_column() function. Refactored UI modules names. Refactored server functions renamed R scripts. Updated reports. Using load_rmd_report() mod_estimate_results_server() module. Added DNA Content Fractions Human Chromosomes (IHGSC) data. Updated dna_content_fractions call mod_trans_fraction_to_full_genome_server() module. Added support tabBox help_modal_button() widget. Added indentation module rhandsontable() calls. Stop exporting get_decision_threshold() function temporarily. “Stains color options” boxes don’t use inner_column() anymore. Updated NEWS.md headers can parsed {pkgdown}.

title: biodosetools 3.3.0 (2020-07-27)
text: Removed experiment_select selectInput() sidebar. Every assay listed “Aberration assays” sidebarMenu(). Loading UI modules dashboard_body(). Navbar now uses rightUi leftUi parameters, well skin = "light". Switched shinyBS::bsButton() shiny::actionButton() calling modal dialogues. New CSS style sheet {shinydashboard}. Deleted old CSS files {bs4Dash}. New fonts CSS stylesheet. New CSS stylesheets fixes existing classes definition custom classes. Added hot-improved CSS class rHandsontableOutput(). Moved custom widgets classes theming.R custom.css. Tweaks box, awesome-checkbox, sidebar submenus CSS styles. Replaced theme_button_status() function proper SASS CSS compilation. Finished SASS box header colors. Using SASS modules reconstruct biodose_style.css. Moved treeview-menu style sidebar.scss. Added checkboxes SASS style. Added missing col-inner-* CSS classes. Added app version sidebar footer custom sticky-footer CSS class. Switched single stylesheet, everything built SASS modules. Added custom style radiobuttons.

title: biodosetools 3.2.1 (2020-02-13)
text: Added required {pander} package generate DOCX reports.

title: biodosetools 3.2.0 (2020-02-11)
text: calculations functions previously provided inst/app/calcs made proper functions package.

title: biodosetools 3.2.0 (2020-02-11)
text: calculate_yield() new wrapper yield_fun(), R_factor(), yield_error_fun(). calculate_yield_infimum() function calculate infima yields given curve. project_yield() merged version project_yield_estimate(), project_yield_lower(), project_yield_upper() functions.

title: biodosetools 3.2.0 (2020-02-11)
text: get_decision_threshold(). get_fit_dose_curve(). get_fit_glm_method(). get_fit_maxlik_method(). get_fit_results(). get_model_statistics(). prepare_maxlik_count_data(). AIC_from_data(). correct_boundary(). correct_conf_int(). correct_negative_vals(). correct_yield(). get_estimated_dose_curve(). protracted_g_function(). R_factor(). yield_error_fun(). yield_fun(). estimate_hetero(). estimate_partial_dolphin(). estimate_whole_body_delta(). estimate_whole_body().

title: biodosetools 3.1.0 (2019-10-26)
text: Unofficial release (wasn’t changed DESCRIPTION file). includes changes discussed David Stockholm (ERPW19).

title: biodosetools 3.1.0 (2019-10-26)
text: Made var-cov matrix optional dose estimation inputs. Fixed calculations make var-cov matrix optional dose estimation inputs.

title: biodosetools 3.1.0 (2019-10-26)
text: Added additional package dependencies DESCRIPTION file. Following ISO, renamed detection limits decision threshold.

title: biodosetools 3.1.0 (2019-10-26)
text: Disabled decision thresholds (now). Hide AIC relative quality statistic dose estimation. Added mean variance count data tables fitting module.

title: biodosetools 3.0.0 (2019-10-12)
text: app now available R package GitHub (submitted CRAN yet).

title: biodosetools 3.0.0 (2019-10-12)
text: runApp() launching Biodose Tools. %>% imported {magrittr}.

title: biodosetools 3.0.0 (2019-10-12)
text: Fixed variance calculation count data. Provide fallback method NB2 using constraint-maxlik-optimization.

title: biodosetools 2.1.0 (2019-07-27)
text: Initial implementation micronuclei, adding support UI server functions. Implemented negative binomial fitting calculation micronuclei count data. Initial detection limit implementation translocations. Added DOCX support dicentrics translocations.

title: biodosetools 2.1.0 (2019-07-27)
text: New bs4MyTabPanel() widget remove unnecessary padding tabCards’ panels.

title: biodosetools 2.1.0 (2019-07-27)
text: Fixed colwidths detection limits. Fixed unnecessary recalculation num_cols chromosome tables translocations modules. New subdirectory structure help dialogues. Added buttons example tables help dialogues. Updated documentation link.

title: biodosetools 2.1.0 (2019-07-27)
text: Added button_fit dependency detection limits calculation. Updated fitting reports (new hot structures & dynamic widths). Moved calculation functions fitting estimation modules files new calcs directory. Translocations reports complete now.

title: biodosetools 2.1.0 (2019-07-27)
text: Disable sourcing translations.R now ({shiny-i18n} implemented).

title: biodosetools 2.0.0 (2019-07-17)
text: Added manual input translocations name. Implemented dynamic calculation hot width counts, cases, chromosome data tables. Implemented manual input translocation frequency subtracted observed yield. Started detection limit calculation fitting module. Implemented Delta method whole-body estimation. Added calculation standard error Fg translocations’ dose estimation module.

title: biodosetools 2.0.0 (2019-07-17)
text: Fixed dependency “Calculate fitting” button translocation module. Fixed calculations whole partial body estimations translocations module. Fixed colors chromosome hot table example. Fix genomic conversion factor read fitting. Fix Fp -> y using dicentrics dose estimation module. Fixed detection limit calculation. Fixed dose estimation detection limits function. Corrected correction FISH Full genome inputting manual fitting curve dose estimation modules. Corrected reading translocations fit curve values dose estimation module.

title: biodosetools 2.0.0 (2019-07-17)
text: Tweaked variable names order cases data translocations dose estimation. Updated help_colors_dialog translocations modules. New module auxiliary rhandsontable() tables used help dialogues. New help dialogues translocations modules. Consistent use genome_fraction variables related genomic conversion factor/fraction genome hybridised. ggplot2 curve generation now wrapped inside function dose estimation modules. Finished confounders help dialogue. New aberration calculation method using purrr::map_df() instead nested loops, 10 times faster. Make clear translocations dose estimation module coefficients full genome. Added highly protracted exposure. Implemented calculation detection limits data. Added dose calculation detection limits section. Changed σ \sigma help dialogues. Added units result tables. Code clean-delta method whole-body dose estimation. Updated plot CI text generation legend account new Delta method separate whole-body & heterogeneous error method selection. CONTRIBUTORS.md now displayed modal. Using ORCID authors possible. Updated institution links contributors files.

title: biodosetools 2.0.0 (2019-07-17)
text: Improved side-widget-tall bottom margins. Moved translocation frequency selectInput() next Calculate Fitting button better UX. New hot-improved CSS class better hot tables’ formatting. hot tables using hot-improved class now. New contributors list style custom CSS style tables. Added experiment/aberration name tab body title avoid confusions. Improved “” tab paddings. Improve widths color columns chromosome tables. Narrower color columns chromosome tables. hot tables’ widths dynamic exact now. Improved small action buttons style help dialogues. New results color differentiate main color. Updated UI adapt new Delta method whole-body estimation. Updated translocations UI adapt new Delta method whole-body estimation. Added CI Dolphin dose estimation UI. Added (work progress) Micronuclei UI. Hide language selector shiny-i18n implemented.

title: biodosetools 1.2.0 (2019-06-25)
text: Start translocations dose estimation module report. Allow using M-Fish color scheme translocations fitting module. Added method convert translocations measured FISH full genome. Implemented confounders modifications translocations generalEstimateCaseHotTable() module.

title: biodosetools 1.2.0 (2019-06-25)
text: New chromosome table structure. transChromosomeTable() transFractionToFullGenomeCalc() moved transGeneralModule.R, reused dose estimation module. Using new chromosome table UI server modules translocations dose estimation. Merged “repeated” fitting modules generalFittingModules.R file. Merged *FittingResults() modules generalFittingResults() module. Updated translocations fitting report new chromosome table structure. New generalEstimateFittingCurveHotTables() generalEstimateFittingCurve() modules. New globalVariables.R global_fitting_formulas list. Added translocations-specific code generalEstimateFittingCurve() module take account used translocation frequency. New inputs used translocation frequency genomic conversion factor manual fitting input dose estimation module. Moved dose estimation generalEstimateResults() module. Modify translocations (X - Xt) whole-body partial-body dose estimation. Added readOnly status Xt, yt, yt_err variables rhandsontable() translocations case data.

title: biodosetools 1.2.0 (2019-06-25)
text: New innerColumn use inside cards/boxes. New widgetLabel() function labels widgets without default label. Replaced old labels new widgetLabel() function. Finished confounders UI translocations dose estimation module. New mySwichInput() function based shinyWidgets::switchInput() sideLabel custom status colors. Moved awesomeCheckbox() mySwitchInput() UI modules. Moved fitting curve input translocations’ dose estimation module top.

title: biodosetools 1.2.0 (2019-06-25)
text: Fix minor error calculation infimum yield values. Fixed “Color options” card color_list object chromosome table generation. Fixed missing type argument get_model_statistics() dose estimation module. Deleted heterogeneous estimation translocations.

title: biodosetools 1.1.0 (2019-06-15)
text: Conditional tabs sidebar implementing bs4MyConditionalSidebarMenuItem() function. Implemented AIC calculation different dose estimation assessments. Added ZIP archive sample data testing. New dynamic bs4TabCard() using renderUI() session$ns() show different tabs depending user input. Implemented manual calculation case parameters (N, X, y, y_est, DI, u) dose estimation module.

title: biodosetools 1.1.0 (2019-06-15)
text: Disabled automatic calculation N, X, DI, u avoid broken input issues running deployed app. Added CONTRIBUTORS.md file. Removed {fontawesome} package requirement. Added translocation frequency genomic conversion factor translocations fitting report. Chromosome table included reports. Major rewrite {ggplot2} plot dose estimation module. Added Dolphin CI info plot using partial-body assessment. Changed display CI plot dose estimation. Genomic conversion factor used transFittingResults() module calculations instead modifying value N transFittingHotTable(). Added theoretical calculation model-specific statistics (glm method) fitting module. Added renormalisation data proper calculation model-specific statistics fitting module. Added theoretical model-specific statistics calculation constraint maxlik optimization method fitting module. Added global get_model_statistics() translocations fitting module.

title: biodosetools 1.1.0 (2019-06-15)
text: Cleaner version topButton() help button help modals fitting dose estimation modules.. informative model summary dialogue fitting module. Better output genomic conversion factor. “Partial” now “Partial-body”. Better titles dose estimation results card. New bs4MyTabCard() function topButton noPadding capabilities.

title: biodosetools 1.1.0 (2019-06-15)
text: Fixed problem fit_formula_raw using linear model. Disabled *--int models Dolphin can deal . Fixed rendering problem Firefox (potentially browsers) count data rhandsontable() using 100% card’s height. Fixed dose estimation rhandsontables() divs Firefox height = 100% card’s height. Fixed height error cases data table dose estimation module Firefox. Fixed glm_results object issue get_model_statistics() function.

title: biodosetools 1.0.0 (2019-05-24)
text: First public beta laboratories research centres.

title: biodosetools 1.0.0 (2019-05-24)
text: Initial support reports. Implemented selection CI dose estimation (83%-83% & 95%-95%). Added method selection partial body exposure estimation. Fixed formatting variance covariance matrices rendered rHandsontableOutput(). Linear models compatibility partial-body (Dolphin) heterogeneous dose estimation. Experimental version new Maximum Likelihood Estimation method dose-effect fitting. Manual input fitting coefficients var/cov matrix dose estimation.

title: biodosetools 1.0.0 (2019-05-24)
text: Added format/MIME type validation file inputs. Render fitting formula using MathJax. Format curve depending selected assessment/method (use appropriate CI) dose estimation. Check yield projection dose mathematically possible. Negative values yield dose changed zero well. Added modification Merkle’s yield error function using protracted exposures. Implemented protracted exposure partial body dose estimation. Added automatic poisson/quasipoison selection fitting. Correct p-values depending fitting model dispersion. Added automatic correction confidence intervals use “simplfied” Merkle method necessary.

title: biodosetools 1.0.0 (2019-05-24)
text: Fixed calculation full genome. Fixed alignment conditional error/method inputs dose estimation. Changed “base” “estimate” CI tables dose estimation. Fixed bs4TabCard() bug.

title: biodosetools 0.2.0 (2019-04-03)
text: Version presented second Team Meeting Munich.

title: biodosetools 0.2.0 (2019-04-03)
text: Migrated UI {shinydashboard} {bs4Dash}. Added data, plot, results export options. Added modal dialogues using {shinyBS}. Dose estimation modules dicentrics. Complete implementation dicentrics analysis. Experimental fitting translocations assay.

title: biodosetools 0.1.0 (2018-11-29)
text: First draft proof concept presented RENEB team Barcelona.

title: biodosetools 0.1.0 (2018-11-29)
text: UI built using {shinydashboard}. Fitting modules dicentrics. Dynamic input tables powered {rhandsontable}.
